mapper.select: SELECT pal.*, u.nickname as auditorName, tp.title as planTitle FROM plan_audit_log pal LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON pal.auditor_id = u.id LEFT JOIN travel_plan tp ON pal.plan_id = tp.id WHERE pal.plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY pal.audit_time DESC
